titleStmt.title: Certain godly and learned sermons, preached by that worthy seruant of Christ M. Ed. Philips in S. Sauiors in Southwarke: vpon the whole foure first chapters of Matthew, Luc. 11. vers. 24. 25. 26. Rom. 8. the whole, 1. Thess. 5. 19. Tit. 2. 11. 12. Iames 2. from the 20. to the 26. and 1. Ioh. 3. 9. 10. And were taken by the pen of H. Yeluerton of Grayes Inne Gentleman
titleStmt.author: Philips, Edward.
Yelverton, Henry, Sir, 1566-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Arn. Hatfield for Elizabeth Burbie widow, and are to be sold at her shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: R8 is cancelled; 2I7-8 cancelled by one leaf signed 2I7.
Reproduction of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: her shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swanne
